text: geudaeneun cholahan moseub-eulo ji og-e ileumyeo dulyeoum-eulo seologa seololeul heullyeoboneun geudeul-eul bolila geuligo midneun jadeul-i sonsiljadeul-eun buhwal-ui nal jagi jasingwa geudeul-ui chu jongjadeul-eul sangsilhan jadeul-ila malhaneun geos-eul bolila sillo joeindeul-eun yeong-won han beolsog-e issge doenola
